4Net Promoter Score Competitor 
Comparison for 2022
Source: Customer Guru (As of 11/10/22)
Net Promoter Score is a customer loyalty 
metric that measures customers’ willingness 
to return for another purchase as well as 
to make a recommendation to their family, 
friends, or colleagues.
Net Promoter Score of  44!  (41)(24)(12)(1)34475“I’m really grateful and 
thankful that WaFd saw 
something in me and 
said yes, here’s your 
career. How can we help 
you continue? And 19 
years later, almost 20, 
here I am, still working 
and learning. Love the 
learning, and as long as 
you’re willing to learn, 
they’re willing to put you 
in a position that’s right 
for you…it’s awesome 
to have a stake here at 
WaFd Bank. You have a 
big family surrounding you 
and helping you grow.”
 
 
 
Shana Owens 
Senior Business  
Systems Analyst
